ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] New Armor Components
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sifaye in Wakening Lands (not sure which variety, as in Sifaye Thane, Sifaye Troubador, etc. or if they all have a chance to drop them)  *NOTE: Plane of
ygData.messageBody:
>Hello,
>
>Where do the components for the Watchman Armor drop? Specifically I'm
>speaking of
>
>a) Sifaye Dust

Sifaye in Wakening Lands (not sure which variety, as in Sifaye Thane,
Sifaye Troubador, etc. or if they all have a chance to drop them) *NOTE:
Plane of Growth faction hit if you kill them.

>b) Holgresh Fur

Holgresh in Wakening Lands (not sure which variety, as in Holgresh
Conjurer, Holgresh Elemantalist, or if they all have a chance to drop them)
*Note: Faction hit for killing them, but just with Holgresh and they
scowled at me in the first place.

>c) Glob of Tar

Tar goo or something like that in Wakening Lands. Can't remember specific
name, but they are black bile golem looking puddles of tar. No faction
hits. *Note, once you kill one, it splits into two smaller ones.

>d) Block of Living Granite

Geonids in Wakening Lands (know they've dropped off a geonid shaman
before) *Note: don't know what faction hit.



>e) Holgresh Wing

Holgresh in Wakening Lands (not sure which variety, as in Holgresh
Conjurer, Holgresh Elemantalist, or if they all have a chance to drop them)
*Note: Faction hit for killing them, but just with Holgresh and they
scowled at me in the first place.



>f) Faun Hoof

Fauns in Wakening Lands *NOTE: Plane of Growth faction hit if you kill them.

g) Haze Panther Eyes

Haze Panthers in Wakening Lands, I suspect. No reports of one dropping yet
though. No faction hit for killing haze panthers. *Note, they cast
invisibility



>Thank you,
>
>Absydion Darkflame <Jesters>
>40 Gnome Wizard
>Tarew Marr
